name: Dancing Evolution
description:
- Dancing Evolution is the most music game and the only music rhythm game that you can play with your own music!
- See how fast your fingers can move on the dance floor! Rock out your finger dancing passion wherever you are.
- You can play with the preload songs or your local music files by your favorite artists.
Feature:
- 3 difficulty level (easy, normal, hard).
- Play songs on your device!!!
- Once the game begins, tap the arrows at the bottom of the screen to the beat.

- Thank for your download!
